sentences.en: A specialist has now pronounced him fully fit.
sentences.cn: 一位专家已宣布他的身体完全恢复了。

sentences.en: All this equipment has received international acclaim from the specialist hi-fi press.
sentences.cn: 这套设备受到全球高保真音响专业报刊的赞誉。

sentences.en: an attorney who is a specialist in banking law
sentences.cn: 一名专攻银行法的律师

sentences.en: Each specialist consultant has a team of doctors under him.
sentences.cn: 每位会诊专家手下都有一组医生。

sentences.en: He was a clay-court specialist who won Wimbledon five times.
sentences.cn: 他是红土场上的专家，曾5次在温布尔登夺冠。

sentences.en: Her specialist input to the discussions has been very useful.
sentences.cn: 她在这些讨论中提供的专家建议很有助益。

sentences.en: In the first instance your child will be seen by an ear, nose and throat specialist.
sentences.cn: 你的孩子将首先由耳鼻喉专科医生来诊察。
我们的专家图书馆是独一无二的.

sentences.en: Peckham, himself a cancer specialist, is well aware of the wide variations in medical practice.
sentences.cn: 佩卡姆本人就是个癌症专家，非常清楚医疗实践中的广泛差异。

sentences.en: She is a specialist in English.
She's a specialist in canine psychology and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她是狗心理和行为专家.

sentences.en: Specialist subjects are full of pitfalls for the unwary.
sentences.cn: 专业学科充满陷阱，专套粗心大意的人。

sentences.en: The Muller family have been making specialist beers at their brewery in Munster for 200 years.
sentences.cn: 马勒家族已经在他们位于明斯特的啤酒厂专门从事啤酒酿制达200年之久。

sentences.en: The peasants looked up to him as a specialist.
The peasants looked upon him as a specialist.
This restaurant has cornered the Madrid market for specialist paellas.
sentences.cn: 这家餐馆垄断了马德里的特色肉菜饭市场。

sentences.en: We profit from the work of the specialist.
sentences.cn: 我们从专家的工作中得到益处。

sentences.en: We waited three months before going back to see the specialist.
sentences.cn: 我们等了3个月才回去见那位专家。

words.tran_cn: 专家的；专攻的；专门学科的
特使，特派人员；特刊；特色菜；专车；特价商品
专业化（等于specialization）；特化，适应化
专门化；特殊化；特化作用
专业，专长；特产；特性；招牌菜
使专门化；专攻；详细说明（specialise的过去分词）
专攻（specialize的过去分词）；使…专门化；详细说明
专门从事；详细说明；特化
使专门化；限定…的范围；深入（等于specialize）
使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明
专家,权威,内行,能手,老手

trans.tran_en: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it
